name: loan-tasks-teams-app
description: Microsoft Teams app for loan task coordination

scripts.dev: npm run dev --workspace @loan-tasks/shared & npm run dev --workspace @loan-tasks/server & npm run dev --workspace @loan-tasks/web
scripts.test:all: npm run test:scheduler && npm run test:smoke
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace @loan-tasks/shared && npm run build --workspace @loan-tasks/server && npm run build --workspace @loan-tasks/web
scripts.start:prod: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace @loan-tasks/server && npm run lint --workspace @loan-tasks/web && npm run lint --workspace @loan-tasks/shared
scripts.format: npm run format --workspace @loan-tasks/server && npm run format --workspace @loan-tasks/web && npm run format --workspace @loan-tasks/shared
